page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox removerows method

argument.name: rows
argument.description: The indexes and/or values to remove from the list. See *[link:A5.ListBox.getIndex]*.

argument.name: animate
argument.description: If set to true then the list will collapse the space taken up by the removed rows before removing them from the data. This can help provied a visual indication of what was removed to the user.
